initContainers.name: init
args:
ops_url=https://gravity-site.kube-system.svc.cluster.local:3009;
if [ "$GRAVITY_SITE_SERVICE_HOST:$GRAVITY_SITE_SERVICE_PORT_WEB" != ":" ]; then ops_url=https://$GRAVITY_SITE_SERVICE_HOST:$GRAVITY_SITE_SERVICE_PORT_WEB; fi;
/opt/bin/gravity --state-dir=/tmp/state ops connect $ops_url adminagent@demo-fabric;
/opt/bin/gravity --state-dir=/tmp/state package export \
	gravitational.io/gravity:5.5.56 /tmp/state/gravity \
	--file-mask=0755 \
	--insecure \
	--ops-url=$ops_url

TMPDIR=/tmp/state /tmp/state/gravity --state-dir=/tmp/state app unpack \
	--service-uid=996 \
	--insecure --ops-url=$ops_url \
	gravitational.io/dns-app:0.3.2 /var/lib/gravity/resources
